content:

inventory=[{"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 25}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 11, "index": 38}, {"type": "cooked_chicken", "quantity": 51, "index": 43}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 20, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft a stick, which requires placing bamboo in the crafting grid. I will first move the bamboo from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
